channel.title: CVE Feed for The systemd Project -- systemd
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The systemd Project -- systemd

item.title: CVE-2019-3815|2024-08-04T19:19:18.592Z -- the%20systemd%20project -- systemd
item.description: A memory leak was discovered in the backport of fixes for CVE-2018-16864 in Red Hat Enterprise Linux. Function dispatch_message_real() in journald-server.c does not free the memory allocated by set_iovec_field_free() to store the `_CMDLINE=` entry. A local attacker may use this flaw to make systemd-journald crash. This issue only affects versions shipped with Red Hat Enterprise since v219-62.2.

item.title: CVE-2019-3842|2024-08-04T19:19:18.556Z -- the%20systemd%20project -- systemd
item.description: In systemd before v242-rc4, it was discovered that pam_systemd does not properly sanitize the environment before using the XDG_SEAT variable. It is possible for an attacker, in some particular configurations, to set a XDG_SEAT environment variable which allows for commands to be checked against polkit policies using the "allow_active" element rather than "allow_any".
